sqlQuery.name: Characteristics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pan_name AS name , ancestor_pan_type AS material_type , property , value FROM apidbtuning.InferredChars

sqlQuery.name: Protocols
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pan_name as name , protocol as protocol_name , property AS protocol_param_name , value FROM apidbtuning.InferredParams

sqlQuery.name: ProcessedSample
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name , input_name as input , coalesce(input_material_type, input_isa_type) as input_type , protocol , output_name as output , coalesce(output_material_type, output_isa_type, 'Data') as output_type FROM apidbtuning.SampleProcess

sqlQuery.name: Datasets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT q.name , q.dataset_presenter_id , dsp.display_name , dsp.category , dsp.summary FROM apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp , (SELECT distinct sd.name , edp.dataset_presenter_id FROM apidbtuning.SampleProcess sd , apidbTuning.PanResults panr , study.nodeset s , apidbtuning.NodeSetOutputNode sl , apidbTuning.ExternalDbDatasetPresenter edp WHERE sd.output_pan_id = panr.pan_id AND panr.pan_id = sl.protocol_app_node_id AND sl.node_set_id = s.node_set_id AND s.external_database_release_id = edp.external_database_release_id) q WHERE q.dataset_presenter_id = dsp.dataset_presenter_id
